website_summaries.verdict: Organize various cosmetics with this 5-tier storage cabinet. Featuring extra large storage options and compartments, perfect for stowing away accessories.
pros: We love the spacious 5-tier acrylic design
Includes one deep drawer, three 2-inch easy slide drawers and a flip-top lid for easy access
Acrylic material is easy to keep clean and wipe down

customer_reviews.title: Stylishly organized.
customer_reviews.text: This chest is massive! I thought I had too much makeup but this box makes me feel like I need even more. Great quality too. Makeup is in each drawer by the order I apply from bottom to top: foundation/powder, cheeks, eyes, lips. I have the top open with makeup brushes and pencils in holders and perfumes to the side. Plenty of room to add more products and nice to be organized. I particularly like being able to see everything
customer_reviews.author: Christie Angel

customer_reviews.title: love the organizer but not the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my sister because she had baskets of make up laying around her dresser. She loves it!!! I like it as well will purchase one for myself very soon, the only thing that bugs me is the price, $99 for acrylic (plastic)....whaaat? all in all it's a great make up organizer!
customer_reviews.author: Kela

customer_reviews.title: I Would Buy it Again
customer_reviews.text: I love the extra storage space I get with this cube. The drawers slide easily and it is well made. I wish the top section was opened with a drawer rather than a flip lid.. I can't use it because I stack tall items on top of the cube! If this is okay with you, I recommend this highly. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: irishbybirth

customer_reviews.title: For the price you can’t be mad.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these back in April of 2018. They arrived on time. Sadly one of the drawers came cracked. So I had to use clear nail polish to seal the crack so it wouldn’t spread. It’s held up well. Other wise they store everything i need it to for my makeup. the top and the bottom drawers are extremely spacious. You can stand most foundations up in it. And the bottom drawers are capable of holding Laura mercier transculent powder in it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Galvan

customer_reviews.title: If you can afford it and need to organize a lot of makeup, but this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Came assembled, sturdy, fits all my makeup and accessories, Wooh! I had them neatly in makeup bags on my desk, I thought they looked “neat and organized before” but still I had multiple other containers in different locations. I actually saw this one on tv while I was at work on a show that had a “specialist in organization” well, since I’d had my eye on it previous, I thought, it really must be “all that” so I’d give it a try. I was able to consolidate everything!! You will not be disappointed. The price is a bit steep, but you are paying for the quality and the thoughtfulness put into the design!!
customer_reviews.author: “V”

customer_reviews.title: Great Presentation!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this organizer it is just what I needed. I was able to place all of my “go to makeup “ in one place & the best part about it is I can see & pick out just what I need. I also purchased the Whitmor section divider & it doesn’t fit like it should in the drawers
customer_reviews.author: Demetria Davis

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased in two years with the first one still beautiful and funcironing as New
customer_reviews.text: Second Whitmor box we've purchased in two years with the first one still beautiful and funcironing as New. Needed another for additional storage as they hold so much. Shipping was extremely secure with it carefully packaged and wrapped inside the box. Hinges for lid are smooth. Only small negative worth noting is that the drawers do drop down a good bit when pulled out. They aren't on a track so it is to be expected. But it's not nearly as bad as many sub par smaller cheaper acrylic boxes. This is simply an item that you can't go wrong for the money, overall appealing aesthetics, storage capacity, and durability
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for office use
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it! it fits US letter stack of papers perfectly in each tray. Looks clean, minimalistic, and easy to see what you have. The top compartment has a lid and is pretty deep perfect space for daily use items. Came in very well packaged and is a great alternative to single drawer stackable acrylic trays from The Container Store - same quality, but much more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Delux360

customer_reviews.title: Organization porn, basically
customer_reviews.text: I've been ogling this thing for over a year now; when it went on sale as part of Black Friday week, I snatched it up! It's fantastic. Looks nice, very sturdy, and so helpful in keeping organized. Enough space to hold nearly all of my ridiculously large makeup collection, from skinny liquid lipsticks to gigantic eyeshadow palettes and everything in between. Love that you can use the lid on top or just swing it to the back. I wouldn't hesitate to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Groovymarlin

customer_reviews.title: So happy to have all of my makeup displayed where I ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited that I came across this product. I've seen similar products before but wasn't prepared to spend nearly $450. So happy to have all of my makeup displayed where I can see it AND beautifully I might add! All of my friends LOVE it and being that it's priced so economically I feel like I can suggest to everyone b/c it won't break the bank. And just before the holidays! Would be a great gift. Especially, if stocked with some of their fav beauty products to add that personal touch. -Happy Shopgirl
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bush

customer_reviews.title: They packaging was very good and insured the clear organizer arrived without any breaks ...
customer_reviews.text: This holds a tremendous amount. The lid swivels all the way around to the back, which is where I keep mine. I put one in the motorhome and even with the bumps that incurs, all bottles I have in the top stay put. Even the shallower drawers hold a lot more that I thought they could. They packaging was very good and insured the clear organizer arrived without any breaks or scratches. I was so happy with the amount it holds, that I bought a second one for home. It sure worked wonders in clearing my counters off and organized my cosmetics. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CharlieCub

customer_reviews.title: This is incredible!
customer_reviews.text: I am completely in love with this organizer. It is so much bigger than I expected and very sturdy. I bought this for my daughter, a makeup junkie, and amazingly it fit all of her makeup (including 3 Naked pallets) and there was still room to spare. The top can be left open to store perfume, brushes, lotions, etc, or it can close and be used as a drawer. It is on the expensive side, but worth every penny, as it is very well made, sturdy, and large. I highly recommend this to anyone looking for a large capacity makeup organizer.
customer_reviews.author: Liz S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Not cheap plastic!
customer_reviews.text: I had been eyeing this for a while and then my kitten took to stealing my belongings which pushed me to buy it. So glad I didn't cheap out as this one is great. Fits Urban Decay pallettes with no problem. I fit OPI bottles in the bottom drawer by laying them down and alternating direction of bottles. Better use of space would be to stand them up in the top, but they are too tall for the lid to close and I'm trying to keep them out of harms way. I'm considering ordering the drawer dividers next.
customer_reviews.author: J Donn

customer_reviews.title: LOVE love love this makeup organizer!
customer_reviews.text: How did I live without this before? I debated over SO many acrylic makeup "boxes" with drawers. After comparing to many others online (and watching a multitude of youtuber reviews) this was the one I decided on. It's perfect! I also ordered the divider insert for one of the drawers and it's great, too!. I leave the top open (swung all the way back) and put lipgloss/lipstick organizers in there as well as setting spray bottles and foundation bottles that were tall. I plan on getting a second one soon! Arrived in perfect condition, no scratches, no cracks, nothing!
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: BUY THIS! It was well packed, arrived in perfect condition and larger than expected. I was able to fit a good portion of my makeup inside - maybe 2 layers of stacked lipsticks, palettes, and compacts! I honestly couldn’t be happier and will soon be ordering another!
customer_reviews.author: xsarai

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small areas and work efficiency
customer_reviews.text: This shipped perfectly and well packaged. I rent a suite at My Salon Suites and it’s great having my own salon space but it is small and I need to set up like a tiny house. This is great for storing, organizing and keeping clean my brushes, combs, clips, coloring combs, and more. I will be getting more of these!!!
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA MCGILLICUDDY

customer_reviews.title: Whitmor 5 Tier Acrylic Cosmetic and Accessory container
customer_reviews.text: I just received this acrylic cosmetic container today and I LOVE IT. It was packaged very well and was in perfect condition. It holds tons of makeup which is easy to see. It is a good size - deeper than you would think. Most useful thing I have encountered for my makeup. I was using a makeup suitcase which is useful for traveling but cumbersome to have on the countertop. I now am going to order a smaller one for my jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Nichols

customer_reviews.title: perfect "Kim Kardashian style" make-up organizer. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am possibly the most indecisive person ever so I wasn't too sure about buying this product for nearly $100. However, when it arrived to my house I was beyond pleased with my purchase. It is exactly what I was hoping it would be. After searching for a Kardashian style vanity organizer for weeks, I am extremely happy that this is the one I settled for. It looks glamorous and high-end. It looks exactly like a luxury organizer for a quarter of the cost. The acrylic is sturdy and stunning. If you're having doubts about buying this like I was, I encourage you to choose this organizer. I would give it 7/5 stars if I could. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Really sturdy and easy to use. I find it efficient in getting to see your products in the see through acrylic, I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Gabianza

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect for a makeup lover who wants to get organized
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to organize my makeup also to clean/clear up my vanity table , I have to say I am beyond pleased with this purchase . I would highly recommend this organizer to any makeup lover who wants to get more organized, it fits a medium and small morphe pallet a medium size tarte eyeshadow pallet as well as a colorpop highlighter and my morphe brushes. It’s perfect for many other makeup lovers necessities, if you flip the lid open like I did it gives you more open space at the top shelf .
customer_reviews.author: angelina ramos

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Looks great and hold all my stuff ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Looks great and hold all my stuff perfectly. My only problem is the middle drawer keeps getting stuck. I contacted the seller and they were super nice about sending me a replacement but the replacement keeps getting stuck as well. (insert shoulder shrug emoji here)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful! Perfect makeup organizer. Good quality and looks gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Silje

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Great way to organize all my hair scrunchies, hair clips, eyeshadows, mascaras, nail polish, lip gloss, foundation........
customer_reviews.author: shoppermd

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this organizer! Good quality for what I think is a reasonable price. It makes my makeup feel so much more organized. The size and depth of the drawers ( the smaller ones and the larger one on the bottom) feel perfect. Also, their customer service is great! One of my drawers came slightly cracked and they sent me an additional free or charge. I 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for a single makeup source
customer_reviews.text: The acrylic is strong and sturdy. I hope to use this for years to come. Using a lipstick and make up brush holders, I can only organize at the top level with the lid open. The bottom drawer is big enough for my cream jars, but not lipstick+holder, or brush+ holder. The three middle drawers are the same size. I can close them with my eyeshadow single containers laid vertically. But blush, compacts, and other makeup has to be laid horizontally. Still a great, single place to put all my stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn R.

customer_reviews.title: Great size and quality
customer_reviews.text: I am surprise of how this turn out to be. It is heavy and sturdy. Rubber little round dots(foot) on the bottom are great, it stays where you put it. All drawers come all the way out which it make it easy to clean. It just feel nice, looks nice, looks expensive. It looks very nice in person. I’m very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Von82

customer_reviews.title: Happpy customer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been shopping around for an acrylic make up organizer for some time now. I was looking at all the really expensive organizers to buy. My daughter suggested I come to Amazon to browse around. I decided to come and take a look...I saw this make up organizer and really fell in love with it. I did decide to buy it. When I received it so fast and it was so securely wrapped inside a box within a Large box that it was delivered in. I am so HAPPY!!! with this organizer, the quality and amount of make up it holds it so awesome. In love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to separate my many accessories. I must say it much easier and neater to find my things. I would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: iFashionista12

customer_reviews.title: Best Looking/Best Value MakeUp Organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is like those Two Hundred Dollar 8 tier cases, except its Prime, less than a hundred, and SO AMAZING FOR MAKEUP STORAGE. Everyone who comes to our house complements me on it and asks where I bought it. Even my husband is jealous. Its seriously a super buy at this price. Great quality, great workman shop. Just watch out for flimsy top hinges - they break easily. Otherwise, buy two. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Girlboss

customer_reviews.title: High quality organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this organizer! It came exactly as pictured, with four drawers and a top section with the closing lid. All of the drawers slide out easily (I was a bit worried that this would be problem after reading other people's reviews). And while I continue to cram more makeup into it (literally up to the very top of the drawers, with some pushing required!), the drawers continue to slide out smoothly. Plus, the container itself has stayed in perfect shape since the day it arrived (haven't experienced any chipping or cracking). This organizer will last a long time!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I received an email from Amazon and it was listed as a deal. I was not looking for a makeup organizer but it was on sale for a good price, I needed more storage space in my bathroom, and the review photos sold me. I absolutely love it. I'm someone who hates clutter but I feel like this organizer looks sleek.
customer_reviews.author: MrsAggie10

customer_reviews.title: affordable Kardashian style make-up organizer
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this make-up organizer! It has plenty of space for a lot of my things! I have even been able to fit several pallettes in the drawers. I have wanted something that would store most of my make-up decoratively. I am impressed with the over all quality of this item. Mine came with some scrapes on the top of the lid, and I am sad about that. But overall I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MauiMermaid

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT PERFECT PERFECT, you won't regret buying this,
customer_reviews.text: I'm In LOVE!! This Is PERFECT PERFECT PERFECT, I have a lot of makeup & have kept In plastic drawers, I forgot what I had many times & this Is EXACTLY what I needed to see my stuff & know where everything It at, I decided to buy things to de clutter all my stuff & this Is well worth the money, Can't go wrong In buying this & Its well made, I never would pay $400 for the Ice box, this Is BETTER all the way around, 100 stars
customer_reviews.author: PinkboutIt

customer_reviews.title: Super Small!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it's going to be fine, but it's just so tiny...I'm hoping it even works it my drawer. It really looks like it's made for a doll house or something. I'm not too impressed right off the bat, but I guess what can you expect for three bucks?
customer_reviews.author: Sheriann

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Good price and appears to be quality! Plenty of storage without taking over my entire vanity.
customer_reviews.author: Erika D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great box
customer_reviews.text: Love this for all my make up it's big enough and deep enough to fit the make up we actually use. Mascara lipsticks brushes eye shadow palettes, Foundation .Definitely rec this one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this came in the mail in it's own huge box, it got to me in prefect condition! And I'm loving it, hold so much of my make up and now I have lots of room on my vanity! If you are a collector of make-up's then this is what you need in your make-room! Thank you Amazon for delivering this to me perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It has plenty of room! I thought it was going to be small but no. I would buy this again. I can see all my makeup instead having to dig through drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good investment for any makeup junkie
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a few years now. Still looks and works great. When it gets dirty I just wipe it clean and it still looks brand new. This is a very good investment and very spacey for all of my makeup
customer_reviews.author: HK11

customer_reviews.title: You are paying for quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality piece with a ton of storage space. The drawers open and close very smoothly which one way this differs from similar acrylic pieces I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Cara W.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this makeup box
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this makeup box!! I've wanted an Ice Box for the longest time but didn't want to spend so much. This is an awesome alternative. It's large but not too big and doesn't look cheap. The top cover can be flipped all the way to the backside of the box to put taller items on top. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!! I've been searching for an acrylic cosmetic organizer for a long time. The closest one I found in price was $250, so this one at $99 is a bargain. The quality is top notch and it looks stunning on my makeup dresser. It's sturdy and well made, the acrylic is crystal clear. It holds a TON of makeup. I love that there is a flip top and it is just really the most perfect organizer. It's one of my favorite purchases EVER. I'm so happy to have a place to store my make up now!
customer_reviews.author: Nodoubtdaisy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing amazing simply amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing amazing simply amazing. Gorgous unit. Fits a ton ton of makeup! Elegant and beautiful. What a nice way to keep yourself organized you can see everything and so easy to get in.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Kuenzel

customer_reviews.title: Very large and amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and I still have it a year later it's sturdy and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Lena Obinwa

customer_reviews.title: It arrived very quickly and when O opened it it was absolutely beautiful! The was not one scratch and the acrylic ...
customer_reviews.text: It absolutely met my expectations! It arrived very quickly, the packaging was great, and when I opened it it was absolutely stunning! There was not one scratch and the acrylic was crystal clear! Also can't beat the price! It looks like I paid a fortune. Finally a fabulous makeup box that looks just as good as those 300 to 500 dollar ones except without the expensive price tag. I absolutely love love love it!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: Amaing had them for years, heavy duty materials , quite expensive though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: glosses and polishes fit perfectly and are beautifully displayed! When I first received the storage cube
customer_reviews.text: The Whitmor 5 Tier Acrylic Storage Cube far exceeded my expectation! All of my cosmetics, brushes, glosses and polishes fit perfectly and are beautifully displayed! When I first received the storage cube, one of the drawer handles was not properly assembled. I contacted customer service and immediately received a response. Further, a replacement drawer was sent by FedEx to me within 3 days! Thank you for your quality product and superior customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This looks even better in person
customer_reviews.text: This looks even better in person. It fits a lot of makeup and other eye creams and things I keep in it. I like the open top for higher items. I am very happy with this purchase, even though it was a little bit more than I originally wanted to spend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L. Trampas

customer_reviews.title: Nice Organizer, Holds a Lot of Makeup
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice makeup organizer. Mine arrived fast and in perfect condition. The acrylic is a bit thinner than I expected but it is still quite solid and sturdy. I'm not thrilled with the hinges on the lid... Flimsy city! They could be a lot better. I can.still recommend this organizer. It holds a ton of makeup and the price is decent.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I've had it for years and it last. I just wish they still had them. I cant find another one like it.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie M.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous just what this makeup junkie needed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful container for all of the makeup I have collected. Plenty of room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: P.C

customer_reviews.title: STUNNING! I RECOMMEND TO ANY MAKEUP ADDICT/ARTIST WHO NEEDS TO DECLUTTER
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been searching everywhere for a good quality acrylic organizer that won’t break the bank. This organizer went above my expectations. It’s affordable, great quality! Came in 10/10 perfect condition. I just received this bad boy today(05/9/18) I ordered it on 05/1/18. The shipping was really fast! Especially since I live in Hawaii, it takes forever to receive anything too! I am impressed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jensen Beate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Makeup organizer
customer_reviews.text: This makeup organizer is perfect! High quality, fast ship and just as nice as Icebox, but at a fraction of the cost. Highly recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Pleased....
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Very durable and not cheap looking. The case did arrive slightly cracked but I called Whitmor customer service and a replacement case is on the way. I am very pleased with me purchase. Four stars because of the slight crack in the case.
customer_reviews.author: Swash

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this organizer
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this organizer. Fits everything and the drawers can come out to be cleaned easily. Well worth the price and when I need to replace, will repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Eng Godburn

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Large capacity tower. Love that the very top lid will fold back against the rear of the organizer so I can get it out of the way and put tall items in the top. I have a lot of cosmetics and skin care items and I couldn't believe this held it all in a 12 inch square footprint around the bottom. Love that the drawers will all pull out completely if necessary. High quality, very clear acrylic and it was packaged well from the factory. Arrived in excellent condition. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle S.

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I love this case- everyone should get one. I have all my makeup in it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thinking of buying another.
customer_reviews.text: I had three bins of makeup that were overflowing and unused, so I decided to invest in some sort of container so that I could see everything, and all my items were kept neat. I love this product. All my makeup looks beautiful sitting on my bookcase. Its strong sturdy, and aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with this! Have now bought one for a friend as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: A mans best friend
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is so thankful to have at least 1/3 of the bathroom counter back to himself 😂. I get to keep all my cosmetics above the counter and it looks fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Paul

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic piece
customer_reviews.text: Though I do believe it's over priced, it is a fantastic beautiful piece and it is very decently built , each drawer sliding out perfectly and u can even remove one drawer without worrying that the one above will fall down. I only buy quality items. I would definitly recommend this item. It makes my beauty desk look completely upgraded. Simple and elegant looking. !! Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YOU will be so happy with this Cosmetic Cube
customer_reviews.text: Listen...YOU will be so happy with this Cosmetic Cube. It's sturdy and well made. It's a great price...so GET ONE ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa F. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This case just arrived yesterday and let me just say I was so excited to fill it with items. It is perfect, nice in size and pretty. I am probably going to order at least 2 more. Great item so worth the purchase
customer_reviews.author: yvette052977

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! It holds soooooo much makeup and while the price seems high it's so worth it. It looks great on top of my vanity and makes it super easy to find all my makeup because of the clear case.
customer_reviews.author: Charisse Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great, love it! Received as a gift (:
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! I now have my desk clutter free and it fit most of my make up, I just have a lot. Drawers get stuck a little but it will get better I'm hoping. Other than that I am happy with my make up organizer.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Good investment!
customer_reviews.text: Finally got my vanity clutter under control and looking pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Suzeanna

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Felt it was a bit expensive for plastic
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Hermes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my vanity and fits a ton of makeup and even use one for my jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Organized!
customer_reviews.text: This is much bigger than anticipated. It holds a ton of make up. The drawers slide out smoothly. It was packaged nicely - no scratches or cracks . Shipping was extremely fast. I was hesitant at first but glad I broke down and bought one. You won't regret purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: Italianma7

customer_reviews.title: Met every expectation
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I hoped it would be. Much larger than anything I could find in local stores. The acrylic is thick and seems pretty sturdy. I had compared several from various online sites and this was by far the best deal. THis makes all the clutter that was on my bathroom counter look neat and organized. There was so much styrophom surrounding it when it arrived that it was hard to get it out of the box but that thankfully prevented any damage. Will more than likely be purchasing additional ones for my daughters to organize their make-up.
customer_reviews.author: 2PDavis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Lady of the house- this product is beautiful. Fits so much cosmetics that there is plenty of room for more. Much cheaper than ICEbOX by Sherrieblossom and very happy did not waste away money for that. I highly recommend this product. The acrylic is beautiful and the thickness is perfect to hold up. The acrylic is very clear like glass, no fog to it anywhere. I will be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: Best quality and holds everything
customer_reviews.text: Game changer! Best quality and holds everything!!! My daughter is a makeup artist she wanted mine, ordered several for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Maggio

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was everything that I was expecting and more! It was nicely packaged and arrived in just 5 days with free shipping! I'm beginning my makeup collection so this is definitely going to be of great use to me. Overall a great purchase! If you're thinking of buying it, STOP THINKING AND DO IT! Definitely worth the money and not expensive at all compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST!!! It is in my bathroom, everyone compliments it. It holds all of my make up and I have a lot of make up. All my make up stays in one place now, I'm not searching everywhere. It makes you want organizers for every thing. It appears sturdy and durable. It is very pretty, I wish that all my make up was the same brand or size so it would line up like the example, but it is not. I am equally as pleased.

product_meta.title: Whitmor 5 Tier Extra-Large Cosmetic Organizer and Jewelry Storage Display Case - Easy Clean Acrylic
product_meta.description:
Style Name:5-Tier Organizerfinally, from Whitmor, the cosmetic organizer you’ve been searching for! Made of pure acrylic, this 5 compartment unit towers over all the others. With its flip top and XL upper and lower levels, organizing makeup has never been so easy, or stylish! 12 inches tall, 12 inches wide, and 9.5 inches deep, make it the ideal size for your bathroom counter or vanity. Upper and lower compartments are a deep 3 inches and flip top allows for even taller storage. Designed with daily use in mind- extra thick casing, oversize knobs, easy slide drawers, and non-slip rubber feet. Easy to clean, just wipe with a damp cloth and towel dry. Whitmor is a 4th generation family-owned and operated business. Since 1946, Whitmor has been dedicated to bringing organization home by creating products that simplify everyday life. Ensuring that those products are built with integrity, value, and innovation is our commitment to you. And our promise is that we will always be here for you should you ever need us as we stand behind our product 100%. Whitmor customer service is available in English and Spanish Monday through Friday from 8am - 4: 30pm cst. Call us and we will gladly assist you in your language. You may contact Whitmor toll-free at 1-888-944-8667 or via email at help@whitmor.com.

BRAND STORY
By Whitmor
feature_bullets: 5 tier clear makeup storage case organizes all your cosmetics
Ideal for use in the home or professional makeup studio
Drawers are perfect for storing lipsticks, foundations, blushes, shadows, primers, powders and more
180 degree flip top lid with long 3 inch handles
Clear acrylic XL organizer with upper and lower compartments, 3 center 2 inch deep drawers
